slide.title: Police stop a bus at Hemayetpur. Photo: Star
A launch, not allowed to dock, is anchored in mid-river at Sadarghat. Photo: Star
The closed ticket counters at Kamalapur Railway Station. Photo: Star
Police check goods entering Dhaka at Hemayetpur. Photo: Star
Intercity buses stay put in Dinajpur. Photo: Star
People on Airport Road get on a pickup failing to find a bus. Photo: Star

Lipi on the verge of crying as she is stuck at Hemayetpur in Savar yesterday afternoon. Her mother passed away at Nawabganj and with no vehicles running, she is worried that she may miss the funeral. Photo: Star
